# spdep

### Spatial Dependence: Weighting Schemes and Statistics

A collection of functions to create spatial weights matrix objects from
polygon contiguities, from point patterns by distance and tessellations,
for summarizing these objects, and for permitting their use in spatial
data analysis, including regional aggregation by minimum spanning tree;
a collection of tests for spatial autocorrelation, including global
Morans I and Gearys C proposed by Cliff and Ord (1973, ISBN: 0850860369)
and (1981, ISBN: 0850860814), Hubert/Mantel general cross product
statistic, Empirical Bayes estimates and Assunção/Reis (1999)
(<https://doi.org/10.1002/(SICI)1097-0258(19990830)18:16%3C2147%3A%3AAID-SIM179%3E3.0.CO%3B2-I>)
Index, Getis/Ord G (Getis and Ord 1992)
(<https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1538-4632.1992.tb00261.x>) and multicoloured
join count statistics, APLE (Li et al. )
(<https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1538-4632.2007.00708.x>), local Morans I
(Anselin 1995) (<https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1538-4632.1995.tb00338.x>)
and Getis/Ord G (Ord and Getis 1995)
(<https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1538-4632.1995.tb00912.x>), saddlepoint
approximations (Tiefelsdorf 2002)
(<https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1538-4632.2002.tb01084.x>) and exact tests
for global and local Morans I (Bivand et al. 2009)
(<https://doi.org/10.1016/j.csda.2008.07.021>) and LOSH local indicators
of spatial heteroscedasticity (Ord and Getis)
(<https://doi.org/10.1007/s00168-011-0492-y>), with further extensions
in Bivand (2022) <doi:10.1111/gean.12319>. The implementation of most of
the measures is described in Bivand and Wong (2018)
(<https://doi.org/10.1007/s11749-018-0599-x>). Extra measures
contributed by Josiah Parry. Lagrange multiplier tests for spatial
dependence in linear models are provided (Anselin et al. 1996)
(<https://doi.org/10.1016/0166-0462(95)02111-6>), as are Rao’s score
tests for hypothesised spatial Durbin models based in fitted linear
models (Koley and Bera 2024)
(<https://doi.org/10.1080/17421772.2023.2256810>). A local indicators
for categorical data (LICD) implementation based on Carrer et al. (2021)
(<https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jas.2020.105306>) and Bivand et al. (2017)
(<https://doi.org/10.1016/j.spasta.2017.03.003>) was added in 1.3-7.
Multivariate spatialdelta (Bavaud 2024)
(<https://doi.org/10.1111/gean.12390>) was added in 1.3-13 (Bivand 2025,
<https://doi.org/10.26034/la.cdclsl.2025.8343>).

**sfdep** (<https://cran.r-project.org/package=sfdep>) provides a piped
interface to **spdep**.

From **spdep** and **spatialreg** versions \>= 1.2-1, the model fitting
functions previously present in this package are defunct in **spdep**
and may be found in **spatialreg**.

Default branch now `main`

Moved from [R-Forge](https://r-forge.r-project.org/projects/spdep/)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`oldcol`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/COL.OLD.md) :
  Columbus OH spatial analysis data set - old numbering

- [`EBImoran.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/EBImoran.mc.md)
  : Permutation test for empirical Bayes index

- [`EBest()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/EBest.md) :
  Global Empirical Bayes estimator

- [`EBlocal()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/EBlocal.md)
  : Local Empirical Bayes estimator

- [`LOSH()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/LOSH.md) :
  Local spatial heteroscedasticity

- [`LOSH.cs()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/LOSH.cs.md)
  : Chi-square based test for local spatial heteroscedasticity

- [`LOSH.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/LOSH.mc.md)
  : Bootstrapping-based test for local spatial heteroscedasticity

- [`SD.RStests()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/SD.RStests.md)
  [`have_factor_preds_mf()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/SD.RStests.md)
  [`warn_factor_preds()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/SD.RStests.md)
  : Rao's score and adjusted Rao's score tests of linear hypotheses for
  spatial Durbin and spatial Durbin error models

- [`aggregate(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/aggregate.nb.md)
  : Aggregate a spatial neighbours object

- [`airdist()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/airdist.md)
  : Measure distance from plot

- [`autocov_dist()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/autocov_dist.md)
  : Distance-weighted autocovariate

- [`bhicv`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/bhicv.md) : Data
  set with 4 life condition indices of Belo Horizonte region

- [`card()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/card.md) :
  Cardinalities for neighbours lists

- [`cell2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/cell2nb.md)
  [`vi2mrc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/cell2nb.md) :
  Generate neighbours list for grid cells

- [`choynowski()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/choynowski.md)
  : Choynowski probability map values

- [`columbus`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/columbus.md)
  : Columbus OH spatial analysis data set

- [`n.comp.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/compon.md)
  : Depth First Search on Neighbor Lists

- [`diffnb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/diffnb.md) :
  Differences between neighbours lists

- [`dnearneigh()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/dnearneigh.md)
  : Neighbourhood contiguity by distance

- [`droplinks()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/droplinks.md)
  [`addlinks1()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/droplinks.md)
  : Drop and add links in a neighbours list

- [`edit(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/edit.nb.md)
  : Interactive editing of neighbours lists

- [`eire`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/eire.md) : Eire
  data sets

- [`geary()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/geary.md) :
  Compute Geary's C

- [`geary.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/geary.mc.md)
  : Permutation test for Geary's C statistic

- [`geary.test()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/geary.test.md)
  : Geary's C test for spatial autocorrelation

- [`globalG.test()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/globalG.test.md)
  : Global G test for spatial autocorrelation

- [`gabrielneigh()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  [`relativeneigh()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  [`soi.graph()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  [`graph2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  [`plot(`*`<Gabriel>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  [`plot(`*`<relative>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/graphneigh.md)
  : Graph based spatial weights

- [`grid2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/grid2nb.md)
  : Construct neighbours for a GridTopology

- [`hotspot()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/hotspotmap.md)
  : Cluster Classifications for Local Indicators of Spatial Association
  and Local Indicators for Categorical Data

- [`include.self()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/include.self.md)
  [`remove.self()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/include.self.md)
  : Include self in neighbours list

- [`joincount.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/joincount.mc.md)
  : Permutation test for same colour join count statistics

- [`joincount.multi()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/joincount.multi.md)
  [`print(`*`<jcmulti>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/joincount.multi.md)
  : BB, BW and Jtot join count statistic for k-coloured factors

- [`joincount.test()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/joincount.test.md)
  [`print(`*`<jclist>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/joincount.test.md)
  : BB join count statistic for k-coloured factors

- [`knearneigh()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/knearneigh.md)
  : K nearest neighbours for spatial weights

- [`knn2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/knn2nb.md) :
  Neighbours list from knn object

- [`lag(`*`<listw>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lag.listw.md)
  : Spatial lag of a numeric vector

- [`lee()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lee.md) :
  Compute Lee's statistic

- [`lee.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lee.mc.md) :
  Permutation test for Lee's L statistic

- [`lee.test()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lee.test.md)
  : Lee's L test for spatial autocorrelation

- [`licd_multi()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/licd_multi.md)
  : Local Indicators for Categorical Data

- [`listw2sn()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/listw2sn.md)
  [`sn2listw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/listw2sn.md)
  : Spatial neighbour sparse representation

- [`lm.RStests()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.RStests.md)
  [`lm.LMtests()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.RStests.md)
  [`print(`*`<RStestlist>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.RStests.md)
  [`summary(`*`<RStestlist>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.RStests.md)
  [`print(`*`<RStestlist.summary>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.RStests.md)
  : Rao's score (a.k.a Lagrange Multiplier) diagnostics for spatial
  dependence in linear models

- [`lm.morantest()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.md)
  : Moran's I test for residual spatial autocorrelation

- [`lm.morantest.exact()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.exact.md)
  [`print(`*`<moranex>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.exact.md)
  : Exact global Moran's I test

- [`lm.morantest.sad()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.sad.md)
  [`print(`*`<moransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.sad.md)
  [`summary(`*`<moransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.sad.md)
  [`print(`*`<summary.moransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/lm.morantest.sad.md)
  : Saddlepoint approximation of global Moran's I test

- [`localC()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localC.md)
  [`localC_perm()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localC.md)
  : Compute Local Geary statistic

- [`localG()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localG.md)
  [`localG_perm()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localG.md)
  : G and Gstar local spatial statistics

- [`localGS()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localGS.md)
  : A local hotspot statistic for analysing multiscale datasets

- [`local_joincount_bv()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/local_joincount_bv.md)
  : Calculate the local bivariate join count

- [`local_joincount_uni()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/local_joincount_uni.md)
  : Calculate the local univariate join count

- [`localmoran()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.md)
  [`localmoran_perm()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.md)
  : Local Moran's I statistic

- [`localmoran.exact()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.exact.md)
  [`localmoran.exact.alt()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.exact.md)
  [`print(`*`<localmoranex>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.exact.md)
  [`as.data.frame(`*`<localmoranex>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.exact.md)
  : Exact local Moran's Ii tests

- [`localmoran.sad()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.sad.md)
  [`print(`*`<localmoransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.sad.md)
  [`summary(`*`<localmoransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.sad.md)
  [`print(`*`<summary.localmoransad>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.sad.md)
  [`listw2star()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran.sad.md)
  : Saddlepoint approximation of local Moran's Ii tests

- [`localmoran_bv()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/localmoran_bv.md)
  : Compute the Local Bivariate Moran's I Statistic

- [`mat2listw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/mat2listw.md)
  : Convert a square spatial weights matrix to a weights list object

- [`moran()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/moran.md) :
  Compute Moran's I

- [`moran.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/moran.mc.md)
  : Permutation test for Moran's I statistic

- [`moran.plot()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/moran.plot.md)
  : Moran scatterplot

- [`moran.test()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/moran.test.md)
  : Moran's I test for spatial autocorrelation

- [`moran_bv()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/moran_bv.md)
  : Compute the Global Bivariate Moran's I

- [`mstree()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/mstree.md) :
  Find the minimal spanning tree

- [`nb2INLA()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2INLA.md)
  : Output spatial neighbours for INLA

- [`nb2WB()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2WB.md)
  [`listw2WB()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2WB.md) :
  Output spatial weights for WinBUGS

- [`nb2blocknb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2blocknb.md)
  : Block up neighbour list for location-less observations

- [`nb2lines()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2lines.md)
  [`listw2lines()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2lines.md)
  [`df2sn()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2lines.md) :
  Use vector files for import and export of weights

- [`nb2listw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2listw.md)
  [`listw2U()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2listw.md)
  : Spatial weights for neighbours lists

- [`nb2listwdist()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2listwdist.md)
  : Distance-based spatial weights for neighbours lists

- [`nb2mat()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2mat.md)
  [`listw2mat()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nb2mat.md)
  : Spatial weights matrices for neighbours lists

- [`nbcost()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nbcosts.md)
  [`nbcosts()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nbcosts.md)
  : Compute cost of edges

- [`nbdists()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nbdists.md)
  : Spatial link distance measures

- [`nblag()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nblag.md)
  [`nblag_cumul()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nblag.md)
  : Higher order neighbours lists

- [`intersect.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nboperations.md)
  [`union.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nboperations.md)
  [`setdiff.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nboperations.md)
  [`complement.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/nboperations.md)
  : Set operations on neighborhood objects

- [`p.adjustSP()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/p.adjustSP.md)
  : Adjust local association measures' p-values

- [`plot(`*`<mst>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/plot.mst.md)
  : Plot the Minimum Spanning Tree

- [`plot(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/plot.nb.md)
  [`plot(`*`<listw>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/plot.nb.md)
  : Plot a neighbours list

- [`plot(`*`<skater>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/plot.skater.md)
  : Plot the object of skater class

- [`poly2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/poly2nb.md)
  : Construct neighbours list from polygon list

- [`probmap()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/probmap.md)
  : Probability mapping for rates

- [`prunecost()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/prunecost.md)
  : Compute cost of prune each edge

- [`prunemst()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/prunemst.md)
  : Prune a Minimun Spanning Tree

- [`read.gal()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gal.md)
  [`read.geoda()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gal.md)
  : Read a GAL lattice file into a neighbours list

- [`read.gwt2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`write.sn2gwt()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`read.dat2listw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`write.sn2dat()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`read.swmdbf2listw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`read_swm_dbf()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`write.swmdbf()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`write_swm_dbf()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  [`write.sn2DBF()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/read.gwt2nb.md)
  : Read and write spatial neighbour files

- [`Rotation()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/rotation.md)
  : Rotate a set of point by a certain angle

- [`set.mcOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  [`get.mcOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  [`set.coresOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  [`get.coresOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  [`set.ClusterOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  [`get.ClusterOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.mcOption.md)
  : Options for parallel support

- [`set.spChkOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.spChkOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`chkIDs()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`spNamedVec()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.VerboseOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.VerboseOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.ZeroPolicyOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.ZeroPolicyOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.SubgraphOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.SubgraphOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.SubgraphCeiling()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.SubgraphCeiling()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.NoNeighbourOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.NoNeighbourOption()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`set.listw_is_CsparseMatrix_Option()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  [`get.listw_is_CsparseMatrix_Option()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/set.spChkOption.md)
  : Control checking of spatial object IDs

- [`skater()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/skater.md) :
  Spatial 'K'luster Analysis by Tree Edge Removal

- [`sp.correlogram()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/sp.correlogram.md)
  [`plot(`*`<spcor>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/sp.correlogram.md)
  [`print(`*`<spcor>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/sp.correlogram.md)
  : Spatial correlogram

- [`sp.mantel.mc()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/sp.mantel.mc.md)
  [`plot(`*`<mc.sim>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/sp.mantel.mc.md)
  : Mantel-Hubert spatial general cross product statistic

- [`spatialdelta()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`summary(`*`<spatialdelta>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`print(`*`<summary.spatialdelta>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`linearised_diffusive_weights()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`metropolis_hastings_weights()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`iterative_proportional_fitting_weights()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`graph_distance_weights()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`as.matrix(`*`<adjusted_spatial_weights>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`plot_spatialcoords()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`plot_moran()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`plot_spatialscree()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)

  [`plot_factorialcoords()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  [`plot_factorialscree()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)

  [`cornish_fisher()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spatialdelta.md)
  : Weighted Multivariate Spatial Autocorrelation Measures

  [`print(`*`<sarlm>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spdep-defunct.md)
  [`print(`*`<summary.sarlm>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spdep-defunct.md)
  [`trW()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spdep-defunct.md)
  :

  Defunct Functions in Package spdep

- [`spdep()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spdep.md) :
  Return package version number

- [`spweights.constants()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spweights.constants.md)
  [`Szero()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/spweights.constants.md)
  : Provides constants for spatial weights matrices

- [`ssw()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/ssw.md) :
  Compute the sum of dissimilarity

- [`subset(`*`<listw>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/subset.listw.md)
  : Subset a spatial weights list

- [`subset(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/subset.nb.md)
  : Subset a neighbours list

- [`summary(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/summary.nb.md)
  [`print(`*`<nb>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/summary.nb.md)
  [`summary(`*`<listw>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/summary.nb.md)
  [`print(`*`<listw>`*`)`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/summary.nb.md)
  : Print and summary function for neighbours and weights lists

- [`is.symmetric.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/testnb.md)
  [`sym.attr.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/testnb.md)
  [`make.sym.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/testnb.md)
  [`old.make.sym.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/testnb.md)
  [`is.symmetric.glist()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/testnb.md)
  : Test a neighbours list for symmetry

- [`tolerance.nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/tolerance.nb.md)
  : Function to construct edges based on a tolerance angle and a maximum
  distance

- [`tri2nb()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/tri2nb.md) :
  Neighbours list from tri object

- [`write.nb.gal()`](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/reference/write.nb.gal.md)
  : Write a neighbours list as a GAL lattice file

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [“The Problem of Spatial Autocorrelation:” forty years
  on](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/articles/CO69.md):
- [Creating Neighbours using sf
  objects](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/articles/nb_sf.md):
- [Creating
  Neighbours](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/articles/nb.md):
- [Introduction to the North Carolina SIDS data set
  (re-revised)](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/articles/sids.md):
- [No-neighbour observation and subgraph
  handling](https://r-spatial.github.io/spdep/articles/subgraphs.md):
